hooks.prepare-commit-msg: branch="$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)" && if [ "$branch" = "main" ] || [ "$branch" = "master" ] || [ -n "$HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS" ]; then exit 0; fi && if ! git diff --cached --name-only | grep -q "^\.changeset/.*\.md$"; then echo "âš ï¸  Warning: No changeset file detected." && echo "ğŸ“ Run 'pnpm changeset' to create one if you've made notable changes." && echo "   Press enter to continue anyway, or Ctrl+C to abort." && read -r; fi
hooks.pre-push: echo "ğŸ§ª Running tests..." && pnpm test || exit 1 && echo "ğŸ“ Checking types..." && pnpm test:types || exit 1 && echo "ğŸ“¦ Checking bundle size..." && pnpm size || exit 1
hooks.post-merge: if git diff-tree -r --name-only --no-commit-id ORIG_HEAD HEAD | grep --quiet "^package.json\|^pnpm-lock.yaml"; then echo "ğŸ“¦ Package files changed. Running pnpm install..." && pnpm install; fi
hooks.post-checkout: prevHEAD=$1 && newHEAD=$2 && checkoutType=$3 && if [ "$checkoutType" = 1 ]; then if git diff --name-only "$prevHEAD" "$newHEAD" | grep --quiet "^package.json\|^pnpm-lock.yaml"; then echo "ğŸ“¦ Package files changed. Running pnpm install..." && pnpm install; fi; fi
